locale.name: English
locale.sentence: You have arrived at your favorite Burger Joint. Their potato fries are formed like dinosaurs
You have arrived at the city's best Pizza Place. They are famous for their pepperoni pizza
You have arrived at the colorful Candy Store. On fridays you can make your own candy and choose the flavor
You have arrived at the always open Ice Cream Parlor. They always have 50 different flavors to choose from
You have arrived at the Museum. Currently they are having a special exhibition on Space
You have arrived at the Library. They have the biggest comic book section in the entire world
You have arrived at the Skatepark. They rent out free colorful helmets to everyone who needs one
You have arrived at the Swimming Pool. Go swim until your skin looks like a raisin
You have arrived at the Arcade. They have everything from Pac Man to Donkey Kong
You have arrived at the Cinema. They offer 4D movie screenings and free popcorn to children
You have arrived at the Toy Store. Their most popular sold item is Monopoly Junior
You have arrived at the Pet Store. If you buy an animal you can get a name tag with it
You have arrived at the Bowling Alley. If you win you get a free soda
You have arrived at the Zoo. You can go and pet friendly goats in the petting section
You have arrived at the Water Park. You can choose of either getting a lion float or a unicorn float
You have arrived at the Board Walk. If you're lucky you can see dolphins playing in the water
You must go to Prison. Your piece is moved to the Prison square
You have come to visit in the prison. Remember to say hello to the players currently there
You get to draw a Chance Card
SCORE ! You got a Free Parking Space. You can rest until it becomes your turn again
With this card you can get out of jail for free. Keep it until needed.
You use your get out of jail for free card and is released; the card is returned to the pile
You have done all your homework! You receive �[MONEY].
You have eaten to much candy. You must pay �[PRICE] to �[BANK_NAME].
It's your birthday! Everyone must pay you �[PRICE].
Move 1 square forward or take another chance card.

Give this card [PLAYER_PIECE] and take another chance card.\n[PLAYER_PIECE]: On your next turn move to any available property and buy it. If there are no available properties you must purchase one from another player
[PLAYER_NAME]: Move to any available property and buy it. If there are no available properties you must purchase one from another player
Please specify the number of players
Please write your name, Player �[PLAYER_NUMBER] (Leave empty for a random name)
�[PLAYER_BANKRUPT_NAME] has gone bankrupt leaving �[WINNING_PLAYER_NAME] as the winner.
�[PLAYER_BANKRUPT_NAME] has gone bankrupt leaving �[WINNING_PLAYER_NAME] to tie as the winner.
You have to pay �[PRICE_FOR_FREEDOM] to leave this wretched place and regain your freedom.
�[PLAYER_NAME] will start as they are youngest
Vil I spille med avanceret regler? (Nu du ellers ville gå bankerot, kan du sælge dine ejendomme)
You owe �[DEBT] to �[CREDITOR_NAME]. Please select below the properties you wish to sell to �[CREDITOR_NAME]:
You owe �[DEBT] to �[CREDITOR_NAME] yet your net worth is only �[NET_WORTH]. You have gone bankrupt; everything you own is now theirs to do with as they please
Must be a number between �[MIN_NUMBER] and �[MAX_NUMBER].
